subs.text: I managed to sell the ticket, for less than I would have thorough an online service, but for more than a scalper was going to give me. And, apparently, I broke the terms of the market service I sold it on. That was unnecessarily stressful.
subs.rawText: I managed to sell the ticket, for less than I would have thorough an online service, but for more than a scalper was going to give me. And, apparently, I broke the terms of the market service I sold it on. That was unnecessarily stressful.

subs.text: One thing I learned from this whole process: A screenshot of a QR code that someone texts to you is not a valid ticket. Only the ‚Äúoriginal‚Äù QR code is. Huh?
subs.rawText: One thing I learned from this whole process: A screenshot of a QR code that someone texts to you is not a valid ticket. Only the ‚Äúoriginal‚Äù QR code is. Huh?

subs.text: Good thing I had to presence of mind to stay there right next to the guy who bought my ticket as he went in, so I showed the gate attendant my web-based version, i.e. literally the same QR code.
subs.rawText: Good thing I had to presence of mind to stay there right next to the guy who bought my ticket as he went in, so I showed the gate attendant my web-based version, i.e. literally the same QR code.

subs.text: He went in before me, which was smart, so that he wouldn‚Äôt be stuck outside if something went wrong. And something did go wrong, which we figured out on the fly.
subs.rawText: He went in before me, which was smart, so that he wouldn‚Äôt be stuck outside if something went wrong. And something did go wrong, which we figured out on the fly.

subs.text: Also, I bought what I thought was a will call ticket but Scotiabank Arena doesn‚Äôt give out paper tickets. It was ultimately emailed (actually texted, because email didn‚Äôt work). So, also, huh?
subs.rawText: Also, I bought what I thought was a will call ticket but Scotiabank Arena doesn‚Äôt give out paper tickets. It was ultimately emailed (actually texted, because email didn‚Äôt work). So, also, huh?

subs.text: The whole thing worked out in the end, so I‚Äôll sleep easy, but was so awkward at multiple points.
